components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to O2 Network in Nepal

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to O2 network in Nepal. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Sudani One Network in Sudan

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Sudani One Network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and DLRs When Sending to Zain Network in Sudan

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays and delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to Zain network in Sudan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Latvia SMS Carrier Maintenance - LMT GSM

incident_updates.body: The LMT GSM network in Latvia is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 April 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 30 April 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from LMT GSM handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance -  Airtels Mobile networks in Africa and Asia

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 2 May 2023 at 11:30 PDT until 2 May 2023 at 17:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the Airtels Mobile networks in Africa and Asia.

incident_updates.body: The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 02 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 May 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 02 May 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries via a subset of Short code and Long codes.
Germany
United Kingdom
Mexico
Spain

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carriers Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of Small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 May 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 03 May 2023 at 01:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Small US Carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 May 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 03 May 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from below countries.
Azerbaijan Bakcell Ltd (BAKCELL GSM 2000)
Azerbaijan Azerfon LLC (Nar Mobile)
Azerbaijan NAXTEL
Croatia Tele2
Israel Golan Telecom
Israel Xphone
Israel Telzar
Myanmar Mytel
Nepal Smart
Pakistan UFone
Philippines Globe
Slovenia TusMobil/VEGA
Uzbekistan UCell (Coscom)
Uzbekistan UMS Mobiuz

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
12 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 12 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
17 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
19 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 19 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
24 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 24 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
26 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
